data.news_body:

The details of the same are enclosed herewith. kindly take the same on your records.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Updates on Acquisition
data.news_body:
Uravi Defence and Technology Limited informs regarding further acquisition SKL (India) Private Limited ("SKL") by Uravi Defence and Technology Limited ("the company"/ "Uravi").

The company has acquired an additional 580 equity shares for a consideration amount of INR 5791881/-(Indian Rupees Fifty Seven Lakhs ninety one thousand eight hundred and eighty one) on February 14 2025.

Owing to the aforementioned Uravi now holds 50.01 % of the total paid up equity share capital of "SKL" and SKL shall now be considered as subsidiary of Uravi Defence and Technology Limited.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at its meeting held today considered and approved the appointment of Mr. Shlok Kaushik Gada with effect from the date of approval of DIN or November 20, 2024, whichever is later. Details are enclosed herewith. The Board meeting started at 5:28 P.M. and concluded at 5:55 P.M. Kindly take the same on your records.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E. November 13, 2024
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board at its meeting held today approved, inter alia, the following matters: 1) Considered and approved the unaudited standalone and consolidated Financial Results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2024, along with the Limited Review Report (both standalone and consolidated financial results) thereon by M/s. GBCA and Associates LLP, Chartered Accountant, Statutory Auditors. 2)Approval of the appointment of Mr. Shlok Kaushik Gada as an Additional Director designated as a Whole Time Director of the Company with effect from the date of approval of his DIN or November 20, 2024, whichever is later, for a term of five years from the effective date. Further, he is not debarred from holding the office of Director by virtue of any SEBI order or any other such authority. (The Stock Exchange shall be intimated once DIN is received). The Board meeting started at 5:28 P.M. and concluded at 5:55 P.M. Details are enclosed

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held Today I.E. November 13 2024
data.news_body: Please find enclosed herewith the unaudited standalone and consolidated financial results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2024 along with the limited review report enclosed along with the outcome of the Board meeting.The Board has further approved the appointment of Mr. Shlok Gada as a Director. Details of the same are enclosed herewith. The Board meeting started at 5:28 P.M. and concluded at 5:55 P.M. Kindly take the same on your records

data.news_body: Uravi T and Wedge Lamps informs the stock exchange about Investor Presentation on the overview of financial position and business operations of the company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Uravi T and Wedge Lamps informs the stock exchange about Investor Presentation on the overview of financial position and business operations of the company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Intimation
data.news_body: Uravi T and Wedge Lamps Limited informs the stock exchange about the schedule of Investors Meet to be held on Thursday, September 12, 2024 at 4.00P.M. (I.S.T) through audio-video conferencing regarding financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2024.

data.caption: Uravi T And Wedge Lamps Limited Has Informed The Exchange That The Register Of Members And Share Transfer Books Of The Company Will Remain Close From 24-September-2024 To 30-September-2024 For The Purpose Of Annual General Meeting.
data.news_body: Uravi T and Wedge Lamps Limited has informed the Stock Exchange that the Register of Members and Share Transfer Books shall remain close from 24-September-2024 to 30-September-2024 for the purpose of Annual General Meeting of the company to be held on Monday, September 30, 2024.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: This is to inform you about the publication of newspaper advertisement regarding the Notice of 20th Annual General Meeting of the Company scheduled to be held on Monday, 30th September, 2024 at 11:00 AM through video-conferencing (VC)/ other audio-visual means (OAVM), including details with respect to remote e-voting information, period of closure of Register of Members, Share Transfer Books and cut-off date for e-voting. Details of newspaper publications are as follows: Business Standard and Navakal.

data.caption: Notice Of 20Th Annual General Meeting Of The Company To Be Scheduled On September 30, 2024 At 11:00 AM.
data.news_body: Notice is hereby given that the 20th Annual General Meeting of the Company will be held on Monday, September 30, 2024 at 11:00 AM through Audio-video conferencing deemed to be held at the Registered Office of the company, Further, pursuant to Section 91 of the Companies Act, 2013 and Regulation 44 of the Listing Regulations, the Register of Members and Share transfer books shall be closed from September 24, 2024 to September 30, 2024 (both days inclusive). The Company has fixed September 23, 2024 as the cut-off date for determining the members eligible to vote at the General Meeting through e-voting. Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body: Uravi T and Wedge Lamps Limited hereby submitting its 20th Annual Report for the Financial Year 2023-24 pursuant to Regulation 34 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change of Company Name
data.news_body: The Central Registration Center (CRC) has approved change in name of the Company from URAVI T AND WEDGE LAMPS LIMITED to URAVI DEFENCE AND TECHNOLOGY LIMITED

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Newspaper Publication
data.news_body: Uravi T and Wedge Lamps has informed the Stock Exchange about copy of Newspaper Publication regarding date of Annual General meeting of company to be held on September 30, 2024 through Audio-Video conferencing in compliance with the circulars issued by MCA and SEBI and information to be given to shareholders for registration of their email ids in accordance with MCA Circular dated May 05, 2022.

data.caption: The Company Hereby Submits To Stock Exchange The Machine Readable Format Of Quarterly Financial Results For Quarter Ended June 30, 2024.
data.news_body: The company hereby informs the stock exchange about the submission of machine readable copy of quarterly financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2024.

data.caption: Financial Results For Quarter Ended June 2024 Along With Limited Review Report
data.news_body: The Board of Directors at their meeting held today considered and approved the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended June 2024 along with limited review reportThe Board meeting started at 05:18 P.M. and concluded 05:37 P.M.The same is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Uravi T & Wedge Lamps Limited has informed the exchange about transcript of the Earning Call held on June 06, 2024.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: Uravi T and Wedge Lamps Limited has informed the Exchange about the link of Audio Recording of the Investor Earning Call for Q4 of FY 2023-24 scheduled on June 06, 2024.The Link of accessing the same is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Revised Outcome And Financial Results - Board Meeting Dated May 22, 2024.
data.news_body: This is to inform you that with reference to the announcement made by the Company dated May 22, 2024, please find enclosed herewith revised outcome of Board meeting including details of Qualified Borrowings, in accordance with SEBI circular as Annexure III.Details of the same are enclosed herewith.Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Uravi T and Wedge Lamps Limited has informed the stock exchange about the Transcript of Earnings Conference Call with respect to unaudited financial results of the company for the quarter ended December 31, 2023 held on Tuesday, February 13, 2024 at 4.00 P.M. (IST). The transcript of the conference call can also be accessed at the website of the company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: With reference to intimation dated February 07, 2024, wherein we had informed the Stock Exchanges that the Company has scheduled an Earnings Call with respect to the unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended December 31, 2023, on Tuesday, February 13, 2024 at 04:00 P.M. (IST). The audio recording for same has been uploaded on website of the company at the below link: https://www.uravilamps.com/financial-results.html

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 12 February 2024
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed herewith outcome of the Board Meeting held today i.e. 12 February 2024 to consider and approve unaudited quarter and year to date financial results of the Company for the quarter ended 31 December 2023

The Board meeting started at 05:10 P.M. and concluded at 05:30 P.M.

Kindly take the same on your record.

data.caption: Unaudited Quarter And Year To Date Financial Results For The Quarter Ended December 31, 2023 Along With Limited Review Report.
data.news_body:
Please find enclosed herewith unaudited financial results for the quarter ended December 31, 2023, along with limited review report approved by the Board of Directors at their meeting held today i.e. 12 February 2024

The Meeting started at 05:10 P.M. to 05:30 P.M.

Kindly take the same on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find attached the Transcript of the Earning Conference Call with respect to the unaudited financial results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2023, held on Thursday, November 16, 2023 at 2.00 P.M. (IST)The transcript of the conference call can also be accessed at the website of the Company at https://www.uravilamps.com/financial-results.html

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: In furtherance to the intimation dated November 09, 2023, wherein we had informed the Stock Exchanges that the Company has scheduled an Earnings Call with respect to the unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2023, on Thursday, November 16, 2023 at 02:00 p.m. (IST), and in compliance with the provisions of Regulation 30, 46 read with Schedule III of Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please be informed that the Audio Recording of the Earnings Call has been uploaded on the company''s website and the same can be accessed at the below linkLink: https://www.uravilamps.com/financial-results.html

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Of The Company Held Today I.E., Wednesday, November 08, 2023
data.news_body: This is to inform you that pursuant to Regulation 30, 33 read with Schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015; (''Listing Regulations'') the Board of Directors at its meeting held today i.e., Wednesday, November 08, 2023, approved, inter alia, unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and half year ended as on September 30, 2023, along with the Limited Review Report. A copy of same is enclosed herewith as Annexure I. The Board Meeting commenced at 1.00 P.M. and concluded at 3.50 P.M. We request you to kindly take the same on your records.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On November 08, 2023 To Consider And Approve Financial Results Along With Limited Review Report.
data.news_body: This is to inform you that the Board of Directors at their meeting held on November 08, 2023 considered and approved the unaudited financial results for the quarter and half year ended September 30, 2023 along with the limited review report. The Board meeting commenced at 1:00 P.M and concluded at 3:50 P.M.Kindly take the same on your records

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2023 Along With Limited Review Report
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors at their meeting held on August 14, 2023 have approved the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended June 30, 2023 along with Limited review report thereon.

The Board Meeting meeting started at 12:05 P.M. and concluded at 12:19 P.M.

Request you to take the same on record.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2023 Along With Limited Review Report
data.news_body:
This is to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company at their Meeting held on August 14, 2023 have considered and approved the unaudited financial results of the company for the quarter ended June 30, 2023 along with the Limited review report thereon which is enclosed herewith.

The Board Meeting started at 12:05 P.M. and concluded at 12:19 P.M.
Request you to take the same on record
